reviews.text: The drinks were amazing!!! The drinks are so good like the lychee martini and yuzu blossom. So was the dessert. Jameel was great !!

Beautiful ambiance and refined dishes!
Loved the potato pave with caviar and braised beef short rib â€” flavorful and elegant.
Great cocktails and friendly service â€” a hidden gem in Flushing! ğŸ¸
Interior decoration perfect for 21st bday!! The food was great we got the seafood pasta and burrata, server Jamil was kind and gave great recommendations!  Definitely coming back!
such a pretty place and the dishes and drinks we had were amazing, Jamil is a wonderful server!
Been coming here for years and itâ€™s always a great experience! Great vibes! Truffle fries are great!
Love the atmosphere- definite repeat

The food was absolutely delightful â€” fresh, flavorful, and beautifully presented. The atmosphere had such a warm and welcoming energy, making it easy to relax and enjoy the experience. I especially appreciated the bartender, who was attentive and checked in often to ensure everything was perfect. Excellent service and a genuinely friendly vibe throughout â€” Iâ€™ll definitely be returning soon.
The food was amazing and our server whoâ€™s name is James was very chill and professional.

Really loved Tavern 157 in Flushing! Cozy ambiance, great service, and beautifully presented dishes. The foie gras with uni was rich and unforgettable, and the braised short rib was melt-in-your-mouth tender. Perfect spot for date nights or a chill drink with friends â€” donâ€™t miss the Espresso Martini!
Good place to dine with friends and hangout!
Great service, welcoming staff ! Food amazing!!!
All star staff and foodğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥
Great experience!

Atmosphere was laid back, we got our food on time and they were very polite. Chris was our waiter and he really did his thing, he separated our checks. Iâ€™ll be coming back here again in the future. I recommend this place.
Great service!
Okay spot
Loved the place, food was good, service was good and the vibe was great.
nice cozy small spot. nice spot
Cute atmosphere
Great spot and nice customer service from Chris!
Muy buen servicio de parte del camarero. La comida espectacular tambiÃ©n

Tavern 157 is such a cute and aesthetic spot! The atmosphere is stylish yet cozy, making it a perfect place to hang out with friends or enjoy a night out.l. Overall, itâ€™s a great vibe with an inviting setup and delicious cocktails. Highly recommend!
Just a cute place! Great for pictures
Amazing ! All around food , service top notch !  Recommend for everyone!
Excellent ambiance and decor!
Amazing chic spot!

I had an amazing experience at this restaurant thanks to the exceptional service.

This restaurant has the best service Iâ€™ve experienced in a long time. Our server was attentive, polite, and made sure everything was perfect from start to finish. He name is Jamil!  They offered helpful suggestions, checked in regularly, and made us feel welcome. The food was also fantastic, and the overall atmosphere was warm and comfortable. I highly recommend this place to anyone looking for excellent service and a great dining experience.
Great place to hang out with friends. The beverage and cocktails are amazing. The lobster risotto is a highly recommend. Great environment and service definitely will come back again

James is the most fabulously fabulous employee who has ever employeed. The atmosphere is warm and the employees are welcoming and personable and James in particular is hot. Drinks have also improved since the last time I was here. I particularly enjoyed the 157 mojito and would highly recommend this drink to anyone who stops by. All in all five out five stars.
Came here for the first time today, the vibes here are immaculate and very welcoming. Shout out to James for giving a comfortable experience here!

Absolutely love Tavern 157!Hidden right in the heart of Flushing,The cocktails are on point â€” creative, balanced, and actually strongï¼Food-wise, everything feels fresh and made with care.If youâ€™re looking for a casual spot in Flushing to eat, drink, and unwind â€” this is it. Perfect for date nights, birthdays, or just after-work hangs.
Amazing bartender with exquisite drink making

Had a wonderful dining experience at Tavern 157!ğŸ˜ The oysters were super fresh and the seared foie gras was rich and perfectly cooked.ğŸ‘ The braised beef short rib was tender and flavorful, while the Chilean sea bass and seafood pasta were both outstanding. We ended with the warm chocolate lava cake which was the perfect sweet finish. Great service and atmosphere - definitely a spot worth coming back to in Flushing.

They play Football on the tele.
The popcorn chicken really is lightly breaded & fantastic plus the sauce it comes with is great.
Totally recommend.

Beautiful place to chill with your girlfriend or wife. Drinks are great, environment is around with all the nice antiques, musics are chill. Iâ€™ll recommend people to come!

Loved this place! The staff was super friendly and made us feel right at home. The food was delicious â€” way better than your typical bar fare â€” and the vibe was just right. The atmosphere is warm and inviting. Itâ€™s clear they put care into both their service and menu. Highly recommend if youâ€™re looking for a spot with great vibes, great food, and even better people. Will definitely be coming back!

A truly delightful dining experience â€“ the food was absolutely delicious and memorable. Special thanks to Jamil and James for their outstanding service. They were attentive, friendly, and made us feel genuinely welcome throughout our visit.
Definitely worth a visit!

Had an awesome experience at Tavern 157 thanks to James behind the bar. He greeted us warmly, asked about our tastes, and crafted spot-on cocktailsâ€”balanced, creative, and beautifully presented. Even on a busy night he was attentive, quick,â€¦

Our server James is amazing, he recommended two special drinks, the mojito and expresso martini, that hopefully will be added to the menu soon because they are fantastic. The risotto balls, corn ribs and ribeye steak were delicious,  and everything came out quick. The service is great, very accommodating and friendly. Overall, shoutout to James. Your hospitality is next level! Please keep innovating and coming up with more drinks. We will definitely visit again!

Delicious food and such a cozy atmosphere! Everything we ordered was full of flavor, and the presentation was beautiful. The environment was clean, relaxing, and perfect for a chill night out. Huge shoutout to James , his service was absolutely top-notch! Friendly, attentive, and made us feel truly welcome. Will definitely be back!

My first time here, the Lychee Martini is soo good very light but packs a punch, the atmosphere and vibes. The song choices are amazing like itâ€™s rnb and chill vibes. So classy inside great place to take someone on a date.

Definitely will come back to try more of the menu.

Absolutely loved my visit to Tavern 157. The atmosphere strikes a perfect balance between cozy and stylish, making it a great spot for both casual meals and special nights out. The staff was attentive and welcoming, and the foodâ€”just outstanding. Every dish we ordered was flavorful and clearly made with care. The cocktails were also top-notch. Highly recommend if youâ€™re looking for great food, good vibes, and excellent service.
Light atmosphere, perfect for a relaxing conversation. James is a chill bartender very friendly. This cocktail was really good, just enough spice to give it a good kick but also sweet and fruity.
Playlist was perfect for a date night. Food was exquisite and quick. Jamil and Nicky did a fantastic job and provided excellent customer service. Definitely coming back.

We came here early on a Thursday about 4:30. The decor was great, cozy and eclectic, reminded me of my Father's office when I was young, cozy wood picture frames and records on the the wall.
Drinks were outstanding. The blood orange mojito was so dang tasty.
Appetizers were great as well.
Popcorn shrimp ava the Risotto balls.
After that, had the Wagyu Burger was perfect.
Definitely recommend this place.

Itâ€™s a great bar overall. Just very limited food options if you donâ€™t eat seafood.

Do love their cocktails and the atmosphere. Recommend for friends catch up.

This was a great experience for dinner! Wasn't very busy around 6 PM on a Saturday. The oysters with uni and roe was such a great combination, packed with flavor. It is expensive, but worth it if you can try it. The fish tacos had an interesting twist with the sauce, which might've been some sort of marinara. The burgers and steak were solid. The steak came out with a crust on the outer layer which was odd. The mashed potatoes with the steak was the highlight of my meal! It had some sort of caramel or truffle flavor, not really sure. Dessert wasn't anything to write home about. Overall a great experience, nice ambience, good food, interesting flavors, great service, but it comes at a pretty big cost.
Happy hour is a good time!! had oysters, popcorn chicken, sangria and wine. All were wonderful :)

James was a one man show attended to everyoneâ€™s needs. He made awesome drinks and showed his expertise and knowledge.
Note, this place is across the street from a catholic school and cannot serve traditional liqour but the Soju inspired drinks were on point. Passion fruit spicy margarita was it for me. Oysters were fresh and well schucked.
Will definitely come back!

Tavern 157 is a true gem! The short rib, oysters, wagyu beef burger and truffle fries are absolutely delicious, and the Lobster risotto is a must-try. The warm, inviting atmosphere makes it the perfect place for any occasion, with vintage stylish decor and fantastic music setting the mood. Highly recommend for a top-notch dining experience!
Came for happy hour and was pleasantly surprised that it was $1 cheaper for hh wine than on the outdoor sign! $7 glasses of wine.  Was quiet and chill. Great service. Will be back to try food!

James is a great mixologist who takes his time and crafts the perfect drink with amazing taste and aesthetics to match.  I have to admit Iâ€™m extremely impressed with the vibe, atmosphere and drinks we were served.  Will be back soon!

Tavern 157 was a great atmosphere to have drinks and a snack. Our server James gave great insight on the menu and was very attentive. The oysters offered great value and taste. Drinks were thoughtful and well crafted. This is a great place for friends and family.
The service was friendly and attentive, and the seafood pasta was absolutely deliciousâ€”fresh, flavorful, and cooked perfectly. Will definitely be back!

I had the best steak of my life; I kid you not, they made a plain ribeye taste and feel like Wagyu. I also tried the Wagyu burger, and it was amazing. The onion rings were perfectly crispy and buttery, while the truffle fries were also crispy and seasoned to perfection. 10/10 would recommend!
James was a great server, super nice and very attentive and funny. The drinks he recommended were great too. Vibes were great and the food was very good too.

A hidden gem  off the Northern blvd exit on the clear view.  The design of the place is as unique as it can get.  The oysters are always fresh and delicious and they have a great selection of small plate options especially the fish tacos personally a favorite.  Great for any type of occasion
